quote: Courted is like a CRM that tells you what to do when.
why_clipworthy: It succinctly explains the unique value proposition of Courted.
suggested_hook: Discover the CRM that guides your every move in real estate recruitment.

quote: Imagine knowing which agents are five times more likely to move in the next 12 months.
why_clipworthy: Highlights the power of predictive analytics in agent recruitment.
suggested_hook: Predict agent movement with unprecedented accuracy.
